content: In the interaction, Duke Vratislav expresses his intention of giving Jimram money, 50 gold coins initially, followed by 25 coins and later another 25. Jimram, surprised by the gesture, expresses his gratitude by accepting the money and making a promise to stay loyal to the Duke. In response to this, Duke Vratislav asks Jimram to remain loyal to him, to which Jimram obliges. Intermittently, Jimram enquires if there will be more gold, to which the Duke confirms. The exchange ends with Jimram expressing gratitude after receiving more gold coins.
